name: Puppet Polka Dance Party
description:
Puppet Polka Dance Party is a physic game where you control a marionette puppet and try to make him do dance moves. Try and match the given positions as quickly as possible to pull off more moves.

Made in Unity 5. Art made in Anime Studio Pro 10.

Download Unity 5 files: https://goo.gl/cQNZU4

MUSIC:

"Dvorak Polka" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
